docs.snippet: Among the many art exhibitions this week is one opening on Friday at the National Academy of Design to commemorate the Bicentennial of Columbia University. Entitled "Memorabilia 1800-1900," it will include paintings, sculpture, drawings, photographs,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Among the many art exhibitions this week is one opening on Friday at the National Academy of Design to commemorate the Bicentennial of Columbia University. Entitled "Memorabilia 1800-1900," it will include paintings, sculpture, drawings, photographs, medals and other material from the academy, various museums and private collections.
docs.abstract: 'Memorabilia 1800-1900' (Natl Design Acad); plans; material from Acad, museums and private collections to be shown to commem Columbia U bicentennial

headline.main: ART SHOW TO MARK COLUMBIA EVENT; Exhibition Commemorating Bicentennial Is Among This Week's Openings

docs.lead_paragraph: By far the most important art event in New York this week is the celebration of the Museum of Modern Art's twenty-fifth anniversary. For this occasion the museum will open, on Wednesday, a newly installed exhibition of paintings and sculpture from its collections.
